description.value:
At 3rd level, you employ tools that aid you in channeling spirits, be they historical figures or fictional archetypes. You can use the following objects as a spellcasting focus for your bard spells: a @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.FB1OqYLUFjNWNcpQ]{Candle}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.ukp2xcDfvY2KJ6ub]{Crystal Ball}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.fq9YxfgFQ12Jg6oU]{Skull}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.HGuLc939bh4KWEqT]{Spirit Board}, or @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-items.26FPKuZqYXbsqdVG]{Tarokka Deck}.

Starting at 6th level, when you cast a bard spell that deals damage or restores hit points through the Spiritual Focus, roll a [[/r 1d6]], and you gain a bonus to one damage or healing roll of the spell equal to the number rolled.

Note: Once 6th level, you can either edit this feature so that rolling it provides the additional d6, or you can modify your spells directly to include the extra d6.

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
